title: Coronavirus outbreak at Marine Corps boot camp infects dozens of recruits, staff members - The Washington Post
description: Coronavirus outbreak at Marine Corps boot camp infects dozens of recruits, staff members The Washington Post Overnight Defense: Hospital ship Comfort arrives in New York | Marines boot camp pausing new recruits | North Korea says it 'dropped the interest in d…
content: The outbreak could mark the Defense Department's largest yet. Defense officials have said that dozens of sailors aboard the aircraft carrier USS Theodore Roosevelt have tested positive for the virus while on deployment in the Pacific, forcing a stop last week… [+3389 chars]
